Summary: Beautiful, bright light ripped through the sky. If it was an astroid, it was the biggest, closest one I've EVER seen.
divs: sighting detailsi was on grandville st in grand rapids, outside the intersection (a music venue), as there was a manic focus\gramatic show tonight. my good friend and i were heading back towards the intersection from the car, when we both saw a large, bright light rip through the sky. it was only present 1-2 secs. if it was an astroid ripping through our atmosphere, then it was the largest one i've ever seen. i really believe it was either a ufo, or a tear being ripped through the separation between the material world and the spiritual world. the light was bright white on the edges, and yellowish and purplish on the inside. it didn't really look like an astroid, i've seen those plenty of times! it appeared to bounce into our atmospheric shield and bounce away into space.
